all_compile.description: do not use precompiled binaries for any tool

always_keep_download.description: should mise keep downloaded files after installation

always_keep_install.description: should mise keep install files after installation even if the installation fails

asdf_compat.description: set to true to ensure .tool-versions will be compatible with asdf

disable_tools.description: tools that should not be used

jobs.description: number of tools to install in parallel, default is 4

legacy_version_file.description: should mise parse legacy version files (e.g. .node-version)

legacy_version_file_disable_tools.description: tools that should not have their legacy version files parsed

node_compile.description: do not use precompiled binaries for node

not_found_auto_install.description: adds a shell hook to `mise activate` and shims to automatically install tools when they need to be installed

paranoid.description: extra-security mode, see https://mise.jdx.dev/paranoid.html for details

plugin_autoupdate_last_check_duration.description: how often to check for plugin updates

python_compile.description: do not use precompiled binaries for python

python_venv_auto_create.description: automatically create a virtualenv for python tools

raw.description: directly connect plugin scripts to stdin/stdout, implies --jobs=1

shorthands_file.description: path to file containing shorthand mappings

trusted_config_paths.description: config files with these prefixes will be trusted by default

items.description: a path to add to PATH
